verbs.description: [ MUSIC ] It [V: 's] been two weeks since the First Lady has made a public appearance , her last being on May 10th when she and her husband welcomed three American detainees home from North Korea . Although Melania recently had surgery for a benign kidney condition . [ MUSIC ] How 's Melania ? She 's doing great , right there , she 's doing great . Just looking at us , right there . [ MUSIC ] [ MUSIC ] [ BLANK_AUDIO ] It 's been business as usual for Donald Trump — same ...
